#summary Dorsal Root Ganglion
@@[Home] -> [BiologicalLifeResearch] -> [BrainAreaPCA] -> [BrainRegionAVA_PN_SG_DRG]
----

This page covers biological details of component Dorsal Root Ganglion.
Region is part of aHuman target integrated biological model.

  * *Top-down path to region*: Peripheral Nervous System -> Sensory Ganglia (PN.SG) -> Dorsal Root Ganglion (AVA.PN.SG.DRG) (see [OverallMindMaps Mind Maps])
  * *Type*: sensory ganglion
  * *Brain area*: [BrainAreaPCA Lower Brain - Peripheral Control Area]
  * *Role*: sensory
  * *Function*: Integration of afferent signaling from viscera
  * *Notes to function*: Sensory nerves project to upper thoracic dorsal horn via dorsal root ganglia

= Components =
(generated)


*Component items*:
  * *Cervical Dorsal Root Ganglia* (*AVA.PN.SG.DRG.CX*): touch/proprioception/vibration sensory pathway
   * *Upper Cervical Dorsal Root Ganglia* (*AVA.PN.SG.DRG.UC*): Integration of afferent signaling from meningles, head, neck
   * *Lower Cervical Dorsal Root Ganglia* (*AVA.PN.SG.DRG.LC*): Integration of afferent signaling from shoulder, arms
  * *Thoracic Dorsal Root Ganglia* (*AVA.PN.SG.DRG.TX*): touch/proprioception/vibration sensory pathway
   * *Upper Thoracic Dorsal Root Ganglia* (*AVA.PN.SG.DRG.UT*): Integration of afferent signaling from visceral heart
